channel.title: View goes black near water
channel.description: When I approach in BMS water or other liquid areas view goes completely black and only visible is redish view when shooting for little time, so I waste ammo to get through such levels :slight_smile: What is causing that and how to fix that?

item.title: View goes black near water
item.dc:creator: Hubicorn
item.description:
Can you provide a screenshot of the issue?

Read full topic
